Introduction

This library implements several helpers for working with file paths.

It implements two different approaches:

  • a functional interface implementing Wrappers for DLL-calls to Windows API and other helper functions

  • a class interface Path which offers an object-oriented interface to the functional interface

AutoHotkey-Version

Tested & developed with Autohotkey 2.0-a104

Credits

  • Perl module Path::Tiny

  • AutoHotkey-Implementation of Wrappers for DLL-calls to Windows API by eamat

Author

hoppfrosch: Original
